adHeader: Experienced Bike Repairman Looking for Job
adDetails: I have over 50 years of bike repair experience. I have run/owned couple bike shops in the past on different part of the world. I am looking for an opportunity to help your business with the experience I have. Please do not hesitate to contact me. I am very easygoing and people love my work, friendly and professional attitude. Please email me or call & leave message show contact info. Waiting to hear from you! Kent
